## IClickOptions interface

Base options for prompting a player to click on something.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IClickOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [if?](./bge-core.iclickoptions.if.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Only create the prompt if true. Defaults to true. |
